page.title: 19Trees in Beckenham
page.content:
A survey was carried out in roads close to Cator Park School to identify and count the numbers of trees lining the roads, with the following results: Alder 19 Horse Chestnut 8 Lime 36 Ash 6 Sycamore 19 Maple 34 London Plane 8 Walnut 11 Cherry 6 Oak 2
Fourteen other different types of trees were also recorded within 100 metres of the school. Many of the footpaths in this area have grass verges and these are frequently planted with trees at intervals. These trees are provided and maintained by the local authority.
